title: European Rendezvous Challenge
description: Two friends want to meet in Europe for a vacation. Help them find flights that work for both!

alex.name: Alex
alex.description: lives in toronto, available june 8-12, prefers american airlines or air canada, budget max $1500

bailey.name: Bailey
bailey.description: lives in los angeles, available june 10-14, prefers air canada or lufthansa, budget max $1800

valid_solution.same_destination: flights must go to the same european airport
valid_solution.same_date: flights must be on the same date
valid_solution.same_airline: flights must be on the same airline
valid_solution.date_availability: date must be in both friends' available dates
valid_solution.airline_preferences: airline must be in both friends' preferred airlines
valid_solution.european_destination: destination must be a european airport

hints.overlap_dates: look for dates when both friends are available (june 10-12)
hints.budget_consideration: both friends need to stay within their budgets
hints.airline_overlap: find the airline both friends can use (air canada)
hints.multiple_solutions: there may be several valid combinations - any that meet all criteria work!
